title: Sportscast - October 10, 2015
text:
Sports » Sports Featured » Sportscast - October 10, 2015 Sports Featured 
Updated: Sat, Oct 10 2015, 11:38 PM 
The full sportscast from the Fox 28 News at 9 on Saturday, October 10th. Related Stories   Ed Thomas Coach of the Week Faith, Family, Football. Words of Inspiration from the Coach Ed Thomas Foundation. CBS 2 and FOX 28 in partnership with the Eastern Iowa Airport are looking for coaches who embody the spirit of Coach Thomas by having a strong impact on the community and on the sidelines. Nominate your favorite coach from any sport in the form below. Your Name: Tell us about your nomination: Please re-enter the code shown in the image below. AP News Wires Entertainment News 
BILL COSBY - DEPOSITION SET FOR TODAY 
LOS ANGELES (AP) -- For the second time in a decade, Bill Cosby will have to answer questions under oath in a sexual assault case. Business News 
US wholesale stockpiles rise in August, but sales fall 
WASHINGTON (AP) -- Cheaper oil and less demand for autos and machinery weighed on wholesalers in August, as their inventories edged up just slightly while sales dropped. Science/Tech News 
IN THE NEWS: YOU "LIKE" THIS -- FACEBOOK CHANGES ON THE WAY 
NEW YORK (AP) -- It's happened to all of us on Facebook: someone says a loved one is ill or that they're going through some other kind of tough time.
